It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.

Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.

 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"

Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.

Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creature

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.

Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our que

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"

We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.

You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are.

It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am st

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "

Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.

Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.

We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen. S

We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures. I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen. 

Sometiems

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "

Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen.

Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen. 

Sometimes in life we are told that things are scary and bad.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"

You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "

 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen.

It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"

"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen. 

Sometimes in life we are told that things are scary and bad.  However, in reality, they are much different.  We just have to be open to htm

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???

 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen.

 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen.

You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen. 

Sometimes in life we are told that things are scary and bad.  However, in reality, they are much different.  We just have to be open to them.  And that is what I have realized.  So with my new f

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you.  You see, we are not scary and malicious insects that some people have lead you to see as the truth.  We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?" I think to myself, "where is this voice coming from?  It can't be from this tiny creature I was taught to fear my whole life, could it?"
I look down at the bee, and it looks back at me.
 In that instant, I began to realize that bees aren't these mean and scary creatures I was once taught to believe.  Buy why was it calling me "your majesty?"
I look around, and I notice that I'm not in my bedroom anymore.
  I have been magically transported to a world that is covered in sweet golden perfection.  A world made of honeycomb walls and beehive furniture.  I was in a castle.  I was sitting in a throne.  Atop my head was a crown that was made with diamonds that shined brighter than the sun.  What is going on here???
A voice booms from the ceiling, "Welcome, your majesty!
  
I reply, "Thank you.  But, why am I here.  I don't understand what is going on. "
"Your majesty, you have been chosen to lead the bees.
 Your whole life you have been running from us.  But this whole time, we have been trying to find you. We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."

We are a group of insects that are kind, caring, and are just trying to pollinate the world so that we can continue to provide fruit and honey to all of earth's creatures.  You were chosen a long time ago as our queen, and now here you are."
I look around the room, and I notice that there are thousands of bees surrounding me.
 To be honest, I am starting to feel quite flattered by all the attention.  I am also starting to feel a little bit more confident about my new role as queen. 

Sometimes in life we are told that things are scary and bad.  However, in reality, they are much different.  We just have to be open to them.  And that is what I have realized.  So with my new found sense of respect for my bee friends, I lived happily every after as queen bee.
